item.title: VidHub vs. Infuse - Which one is the best video player on iOS Platform
item.author: hugozhu@gmail.com (Hugo Zhu)
item.description: In this post, we are going to compare two high-profile media players : VidHub and Infuse. While they all have their own advantages and disadvantages, they are all capable of providing users with a high-quality media experience in different scenarios. Price advantage: VidHub is free to use on all iOS/Mac/tvOS platforms, which saves users a lot of money. In comparison, the price of the Infuse is on the more expensive side, and the buyout requires 698, but the dirt area will be a little more cost-effective.
